titles.title: Michael E. DeBakey Stamp Act
Michael E. DeBakey Stamp Act
To provide for the issuance of a forever stamp to honor the work of Dr. Michael Ellis DeBakey, who helped develop the mobile army surgical hospital, and for other purposes.
Michael E. DeBakey Stamp Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Michael E. DeBakey Stamp Act
This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to provide for the issuance of a forever stamp to honor the work of Dr. Michael Ellis DeBakey, who helped develop the mobile army surgical hospital.
